com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.control

Annotation Type TFileField


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface TFileField
     Build a TFileField component.

 Types supported:
 
 TSimpleFileEntityProperty, TSimpleFileModelProperty, Property<byte[]>
 
 Example: 
 
 In a TModel implementation we have:
 
  @Entity
  @Table(name = DomainTables.product, schema = DomainSchema.main)
  public class Product extends TEntityImpl{
     ...
     @OneToOne(cascade=CascadeType.ALL, fetch=FetchType.EAGER)
     private TFileEntity imagem;
     ...
  }
  
 and in the ITModelView: 
  
  public class ProductModelView extends TEntityModelView<Product> {
     ...
     @TFileReader
     @TLabel(text = "Imagem", control=@TControl(prefWidth=500))
     @TFileField(extensions = TFileExtension.ALL_FILES, required = false, preLoadFileBytes=false, showImage=true)
     private TSimpleFileEntityProperty imagem;
     ...
  }
    Author:
    Davis Gordon
    See Also:
    TByteArrayReader, TFileReader, ITModelView
